blockdesc-bettercrate-diamond*:
Can hold up to 2048 stacks of the same item type.
Cannot hold perishable or hot items.
block-handbooktext-*bettercrate-diamond*: Upgraded from Better Crate (Steel) by using a Better Crate Upgrade (Diamond). How to use Left mouse click: Take out a single item. Sneak + Left mouse click: Take out a stack of item. Right mouse click: Put in a new or matching stack. Hold Right mouse: Put in all matching stacks from player's inventory. Sprint + Right mouse click + bare hand: Lock/unlock item type.
itemdesc-upgrade-diamond: Upgrades a Better Crate (Steel) to Better Crate (Diamond).
item-handbooktext-*upgrade-diamond*: Uses Upgrades a Better Crate (Steel) to Better Crate (Diamond). How to use Sneak + Right mouse click on Better Crate (Steel).
